text: Sunset Grill in Markham, ON Sunset Grill is a Canadian-based fast food restaurant chain specializing in breakfast items. The restaurant was founded in 1985 by Angelo Christou in The Beaches neighbourhood of Toronto, Ontario. As of March, 2019, they have more than 80 locations in southern Ontario, mostly in the Greater Toronto and Hamilton area. ==References== ==External link== *Sunset Grill Category:1985 establishments in Ontario Category:Fast- food chains of Canada Category:Restaurants established in 1985
title: Sunset Grill (Canadian restaurant chain)
